name: Lake Road
description:
Lake Road is a simple addicting hyper-casual game that anyone can play.
How to play:
This is a parkour game
Click the mouse and build your path, avoid obstacles and collect blocks to reach the top of the finish line
Try to reach the highest point before reaching the next level to win
Please use your plank sparingly
Game contains :
A total of 20 levels
The game is in the development stage, and new gameplay and modes will be added in the future
